FH, is this the old "combo is deprecated thing"?  Please close this PR.

Hi,
  It is a GtkCombo issue.  Is there a long term plan to solve this?  I fixed it
by removing the line that says "#define GTK_DISABLE_DEPRECATED" in swt.c

Thanx.

You are compiling swt source on top of GTK 2.4, right ?

Steve: Yes, as GTK 2.4 GtkCombo is a deprecated.
*** Bug 55934 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Is there any patch I can use in the meantime that will enable me to at least 
compile eclipse without removing the GTK_DISABLE_DEPRECATED.  I just realized 
that this problem is also found in eclipse M8

You can either remove
#define G_DISABLE_DEPRECATED
#define GTK_DISABLE_DEPRECATED
From swt file os.h -or- add the lines (supposing you still have GTK+-2.2.x in 
your system):
PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/path/to/gtk-2.2.x/lib/pkgconfig/
LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/path/to/gtk-2.2.x/lib/
to make_gtk.mak. Since you need to edit make_gtk.mak to fix JAVA_HOME should 
not be a problem to edit it a little bit more to force it to compile SWT 
source using GTK 2.2.x.

Hi,
  Well I found that by removing the GTK_DISABLE_DEPRECATED line in structs.c, I
was able to solve it for eclipse-2.1.3 but that does not appear to work for
eclipse-3.0M8.  I'm even thinking of hacking it to support the new 2.4
requirement of GtkComboBoxEvent.

Ciao
ST Lim
